law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 382, sec. 2, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 3, effective March 26, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 190, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1988.
